title: FineDine Glass Loaf Pan with Lid - 2-Pack with BPA-free Airtight Lids - Perfect for Baking Bread, Meatloaf, and More
features: DURABLE BOROSILICATE GLASS: Our loaf pans are made of tough borosilicate glass that can withstand thermal shock, making them safe for the oven, microwave, freezer, and dishwasher.
AIRTIGHT LIDS INCLUDED: Unlike other glass pans, our set comes with a sturdy, leakproof lid that's perfect for storing food straight from the oven.
VERSATILE DESIGN: Use our loaf pans to bake casseroles, pastas, bread, meat loaves, pound cakes, and more. They're also great for molding and freezing ice cream logs.
HEALTHIER AND PURER: Our glass pans are chemical-free and won't absorb tastes or smells from your food. Plus, they won't warp like other materials.
CLEAR AND CONVENIENT: With a sleek, transparent design and ergonomic handles, our loaf pans are easy to transport and store. Plus, you can keep an eye on your food as it bakes.
